document_data.name: Smiling Company
document_data.mainbody: The '''Smiling Company''' was a band of adventurers that operated out of [[Yartar]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. They were fairly successful, having journeyed and quested together for nearly a decade.
document_data.Organization: The company was part of a larger group of warriors, though other members had since ceased their adventuring ways.
document_data.Activities: Every year the Smiling Company made notable contributions to the [[Tymora]]n temple in Yartar, the [[Happy Hall of Fortuitous Happenstance]].
document_data.History: The Smiling Company formed sometime around the {{YearlinkName|1479}}. Unlike many Yartarran adventuring groups that were formed every summer, they remained active and prosperous for many years.
